title.rendered: Samsung Original Wireless Charging Stand – Black

content.rendered:
Product Description

Compatibility: The wi-fi Fast Charge characteristic is appropriate with Galaxy Note5, Galaxy S6 edge+ and later fashions of the Galaxy Note and Galaxy S sequence. Wireless Fast Charge is just not appropriate with Galaxy S6, Galaxy S6 edge or Galaxy S6 energetic. Those gadgets will cost at common pace. Universal wi-fi charging help for all Qi-enabled gadgets. Charging your machine wirelessly might require the addition of a wi-fi charging cowl (offered individually). Fast charging for final enjoyment: Thanks to its quicker charging capabilities you’ll have all the ability you might want to keep targeted on what you’re doing always. Ultimate viewing expertise: Provides an elevated base to allow panorama and portrait modes, and look at incoming notifications whereas charging. Preferred viewing: Watch no matter you select, nonetheless you want. Built-in twin standing mode offers vertical and horizontal viewing choices to your favorite multimedia, together with motion pictures and movies.

Box Contains

Samsung Original Wireless Charging Stand, Travel Adaptor

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Enjoy a faster cost
View incoming notifications while charging
Choose from two constructed-in standing modes
Enjoy your favorite multimedia while charging
